TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 套用至 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務，以表示是否可以在 ASP.NET 相容性程式碼中執行該服務。

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當套用至服務實作類別時，這個屬性會指出該服務是否需要或是否支援為裝載應用程式網域 (AppDomain) 啟用的 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性模式。When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). 裝載 WCF 服務的 AppDomains 可以在兩個不同的裝載模式中執行：AppDomains hosting WCF services can run in two different hosting modes: - 混合傳輸模式 （預設值）： 在此模式中，WCF 服務不會參與[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]HTTP 管線。Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, WCF services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. 這可確保 WCF 服務的行為一致，不論裝載環境和傳輸。This guarantees that a WCF service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性模式： 在此模式中，WCF 服務會參與[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]HTTP 管線，其方式類似 ASMX 服務。 Compatibility Mode: In this mode, WCF services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 檔案授權、 UrlAuthorization 和 HTTP 工作階段狀態等功能都適用於在此模式中執行的 WCF 服務。 features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to WCF services running in this mode. 裝載模式是由應用程式層級的組態旗標 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 所控制。The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` 這個旗標是`false`根據預設，因此 WCF 服務執行 「 混合傳輸模式中除非您明確選擇進入[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]相容性模式。This flag is `false` by default and thus WCF services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. 如需 ASP.NET 相容性模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。For more informaiton about ASP.NET compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 您可以使用 屬性來完成這個工作。Use the property to do this. 在執行階段時，應用程式可以藉由檢查靜態屬性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值來偵測 相容性模式是否為啟用狀態。At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples 服務開發人員可以確保，其服務只在 ASP.NET 相容性模式中設定執行屬性至如下列範例所示Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定服務所需要的 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

value.span: ，指出服務所需要 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性的層級。

span.span: The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 屬性以程式碼來設定裝載模式。Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. 這可以藉由設定應用程式層級的組態旗標 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 來完成。This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 在執行階段時，應用程式可以藉由檢查靜態屬性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值來偵測 相容性模式是否為啟用狀態。At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

exception.span: 該值不是 的其中一個有效值。

span.span: The value is not a valid one for the .

summary.span: 加入繫結項目可存取的自訂資料，以便支援合約實作。

span.span: Adds custom data that the binding elements can access to support the implementation of the contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援 WCF 基礎結構，而且不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method supports the WCF infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: 檢查裝載的型別與 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性需求是否相同。

span.span: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援 WCF 基礎結構，而且不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method supports the WCF infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

exception.span: 服務裝載與 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性需求不相容。

span.span: The service hosting is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
